name: Spark Joy (lookachoo)
description:
Team Name: Broken Games

Name & Email: Matthew Broking - Brokingm@gmail.com

Game Name: Spark Joy

Name of Submission: BrokenGames_SparkJoy

Pre-made/Purchased Content:

All 3D models - Generic Props 1-12 by MadHoundGames. Purchased on the Epic Marketplace and customized/edited as needed in UE4. Level design and lighting were original work and not premade map that came with the package.

VR Pawn System - VRGK: Virtual Reality Gaming Kit by Divivor. Purchased on the Epic Marketplace. Certain parts of the Blueprints were customized as needed.
